TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Int64Animation extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int64AnimationBase

summary.span: 在指定的 期间使用线性内插对两个目标值之间的 属性值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画在一段时间内更新属性的值。An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time. 动画效果可能是微妙的，例如， 向左或向右移动几个像素，如将对象扩大200到原来的大小，同时旋转对象并更改其颜色。An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color. 若要在 Windows Presentation Foundation 中创建动画 (WPF) ，请将动画与对象的属性值关联。To create an animation in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), you associate an animation with an object's property value. ## 目标值Target Values 类在两个目标值之间创建转换。The class creates a transition between two target values. 若要设置其目标值，请使用其 、 和 属性。To set its target values, use its , , and properties. 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties specified|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. 有关将多个动画应用于单个属性的信息，请参阅 [关键帧动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview)。For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview). ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 由于 该类继承自 ，因此 对象获取几个特殊功能，其中包括：它们可以声明为 [资源](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define)、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。Because the class inherits from , objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as [resources](/dotnet/desktop-wpf/fundamentals/xaml-resources-define), shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关对象提供的不同功能的详细信息 ，请参阅可 [冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.

value.span: 动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将值 "按" 的值指定为特定量而不是指定起始值或结束值，请使用属性。Use the property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value. 你还可以将 属性与属性结合使用 。You may also use the property with the property. 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|导致的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **注意** 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `By`= " "/><*object* `By`=" "/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `By`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: Gets or sets the easing function applied to this animation.

value.span: 应用于此动画的缓动函数。

span.span: The easing function applied to this animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓动函数允许你创建各种专用动画效果，其中包括弹跳、弹簧振荡以及各种大小加速和减速动画。Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|导致的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **注意** 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `From`= " "/><*object* `From`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `From`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `From`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: protected override long GetCurrentValueCore (long defaultOriginValue, long defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance int64 GetCurrentValueCore(int64 defaultOriginValue, int64 defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetCurrentValueCore (defaultOriginValue As Long, defaultDestinationValue As Long, animationClock As AnimationClock) As Long
protected: override long GetCurrentValueCore(long defaultOriginValue, long defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 此值是提供给动画的建议原始值，如果动画没有属于自己的起始值，则使用此值。

span.span: This value is the suggested origin value provided to the animation to be used if the animation does not have its own concept of a start value.

param.span: 如果该动画是组合链中的第一个动画，则此值将是快照值（如果存在的话）或是基属性值（如果不是快照值）；否则此值将是链中前一个动画返回的值（链中的 animationClock 不是 Stopped）。

span.span: If this animation is the first in a composition chain this value will be the snapshot value if one is available or the base property value if it is not; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an animationClock that is not Stopped.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 此值是提供给动画的建议目标值，如果动画没有属于自己的结束值，则使用此值。

span.span: This value is the suggested destination value provided to the animation to be used if the animation does not have its own concept of an end value.

param.span: 如果动画位于属性上第一个动画组合层中，则此值将是基值；否则此值将是属性上前一个动画组合层中的输出值。

span.span: This value will be the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise this value will be the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 这是可以生成 CurrentTime 或 CurrentProgress 值的 animationClock，动画使用这些值生成其输出值。

span.span: This is the animationClock which can generate the CurrentTime or CurrentProgress value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.

summary.span: 计算此动画认为应该为属性当前值的值。

span.span: Calculates the value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

returns.span: 此动画信任的值应为该属性的当前值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画仅设置了其 、 或 属性之一，则设置此属性将不起作用。If the animation has only one of its , , or properties set, setting this property has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性的出现异常，它来自的标识符字段来自 ，并由各种派生类共享。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果动画的属性 使其重复播放时，动画将其取值进行累积，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，动画的输出值仅在动画的 属性使其重复其简单持续时间时才会累积。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它在重新启动时不会累积其值，因为它的父级重复，或者其时钟已从调用中重新启动 。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性的出现异常，它来自的标识符字段来自 ，并由各种派生类共享。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

The ending value of the animation.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表总结了如何 结合使用、和 属性，以确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|导致的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||动画从属性指定的值前进到要 进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值，具体取决于以前的动画的配置方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |动画从属性指定的值前进 到和属性的和所指定的值 。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画从经过动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到属性指定的值 。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从要进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一个动画的输出值前进到该值与属性指定的值的和 。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **注意** 如果同时设置了 和 属性，则 属性优先，并忽略该 属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法或在两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，请使用 对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `To`= " "/><*object* `To`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `To`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
